SEARCH
Package proj

Class Rental

java.lang.Object
proj.Rental
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Rental extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a single rental event, associating a User with a Vehicle. This class captures all details of a rental, including the user, vehicle, rental period, and any optional extras like a helmet or light. It is serializable to allow for persistent storage.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Rental

      public Rental(User user, Vehicle vehicle, String startDate, int startHour, String endDate, int endHour, boolean helmet, boolean light)
      Constructs a new Rental object with all necessary details.
      Parameters:
      user - The User who made the rental.
      vehicle - The Vehicle that was rented.
      startDate - The start date of the rental in "dd/mm/yyyy" format.
      startHour - The hour the rental started (0-23).
      endDate - The end date of the rental in "dd/mm/yyyy" format.
      endHour - The hour the rental ended (0-23).
      helmet - true if a helmet was included, false otherwise.
      light - true if a light was included, false otherwise.

  • Method Details

    • rentalDuration

      public int rentalDuration()
      Calculates the total duration of the rental in hours. This is a simplified calculation that assumes 30 days per month and 365 days per year.
      Returns:
      The duration in hours.
